18151601.count: Congo, Democratic Republic of,CONGO, DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF

repnme.cdata!:
Zaire - Second Gecamines Technical
            Assistance Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Gecamines Techical Assistance
            project will help finance a technical assistance project to
            Zaire's leading mining company and foreign exchange
            earner, Gecamines. The six major components of the project
            will cover: (i) restructuring and improving Gecamines'
            purchasing and materials management operations; (ii)
            improving maintenance management and operations; (iii)
            assisting Gecamines' personnel department in improving
            personnel management; (iv) continuing assistance to the
            finance department in Gecamines in improving the financial
            operations of the company and expanding the use of cost
            accounting systems; (v) strengthening the information
            technology group in Gecamines to handle the increased demand
            for information technology support; and (vi) carrying out
            strategic studies, including developing an environmental
            action plan, to assist the company in formulating its long
            range action plan. The project provides funds for technical
            assistance from consulting firms as well as individual experts.
